content:
Goerli testnet is deprecated: https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/11/30/goerli-lts-update
Use Sepolia for application layer testing and use Hole≈°ky for staking & infrastructure testing

If you drop your address & how much you need you may get a better response.  I gave away all my Goerli testnet ETH.
